posts.title: Fat Tuesday at ODM!
posts.description:
Mardi Gras is during SF Beer Week this year and we'd love for you to come celebrate with us at Old Devil Moon! All year 'round at ODM we do great NOLA-influenced fare and a cocktail program with a Louisiana bent, but we're taking it to the next level for Fat Tuesday:

~ Got a VERY special & limited keg for Fat Tuesday:
Modern Times - Haunted Stars w/ NOLA Coffee - 8% ABV - rye imperial porter with New Orleans-style coffee that provides notes of coffee, chicory, and vanilla

~ LIVE MUSIC - The Derek Fairchild Bevy will be playing live Mardi Gras vibe tunes starting at 8PM! We'll jamming out to great NOLA jazz and marching bands the rest of the night!

~ Food Special - we're doing a special jambalaya! Our kitchen is always open from 6-10PM on weeknights.

~ Zapp's Chips - we'll have NOLA's favorite Voodoo flavor potato chips!

~ King Cakes - we're getting a bunch of traditional King Cakes made by a local bakery to share with the crowd

~ It's SF Beer Week - ODM's everyday draft list is one of the best in SF, but during SFBW it's off the chart. The sloppy seconds from our Sour Saturday Sh!tstorm and our Won't You Be My Neighbor event on Monday will be pouring.

~ ODM has a ridiculous line up of SF Beer Week events, one every day, including Whales of the Deep, Fat Tuesday, and HazeFest II. Check them all out here: https://www.facebook.com/olddevilmoonSF/events

If you can't be in NOLA for the Mardi Gras, laissez les bon temps rouler at ODM!

posts.title: Hopcentric Tuesday
posts.description: Bustin’ Out tha hops at BEER REVOLUTION! Stellar line-up coming.

posts.title: Beer Pairing Dinner w. Berryessa Brewing
posts.description:
We're excited to host one of our favorite NorCal breweries for a tasty dinner. Berryessa will be digging into their cellar for a few gems, as well as some new releases. Chef Michael Bilger will be pairing 5 courses alongside each of these treats.

Beers poured:
Thirst Responders
2011 Tourist Trap Tripel
Diminished Returns
Big Brown Beaver
2012 Cliffs Fiscal Barleywine

Food menu & tickets coming soon

posts.title: Producer Dinner with Fort Point
posts.description:
18 Reasons and Fort Point are excited to team up for a special SF Beer Week collaboration! Chef Mike Weller has created a special menu featuring some of Fort Point's favorite styles. We invite you to share a spot at our communal tables, break bread, drink beer, and learn from Fort Point's Head Brewer Mike Schnebeck.

MENU

Passed Hors d’Oeuvres
Paired with Resonance - Blended Saison

House-cured Tenderloin “Ham” Mini Biscuit with Orange Butter
Pork RIllettes Croquette with Apricot Habenero Mojo
Cubano "Cigar-ito": Baked Phyllo-wrapped Little Cigars of Roast Pork, Cheese and Pickle

Beer Steamed Mussels with Leeks, Fried Shallots, and Roasted Garlic Bread
Paired with Park – Hoppy Wheat Beer

“Smoked” Trout, Cress, and Beet Salad; Horseradish, Apple Vinaigrette
Paired with Manzanita - Smoked Altbier

Roast Chicken, Caramelized Shallot Jus, Root Vegetable Gratin, Farro and Winter Greens Pilaf
Paired with Westfalia - Nuremberg Red Ale
Paired with KSA – Kolsch Style Ale

Lemongrass Crème Brûlée and Ginger Snaps
Paired with Villager – San Francisco Style IPA

posts.title: Stone Brewing Beer Dinner
posts.description:
Celebrate SF Beer Week 2018 with us during one of our annual beer dinners. On February 13, Stone Brewing and Hops & Hominy will be teaming up to provide you a 5 course, 5 beer tasting menu.

Menu will be listed shortly.

posts.title: Fort Point + AIGA SF: Designers Who Love Beer
posts.description: In celebration of San Francisco Beer Week, AIGA SF will have Fort Point and founder Justin Catalana in the house. We’ll be talking with him about what it means to be a design-driven company, Fort Point’s love and commitment to SF, and of course that hoppy, bubbly, nectar: beer!

posts.title: Flights and Flowers, Beers and Blooms
posts.venue: Barbary coast Taproom Noc Noc on Broadway
posts.description:
Valentines Day is around the corner! Celebrate with a flight of beer and then take home a bouquet from local florist Talia Elterman.

Flight of beer will feature Almanac, Dionysus, Fieldwork, Barebottle and more to be added.

We can host up tp 20 people so please get your ticket ASAP!

posts.title: Beer Nerd Trivia
posts.description:
Join our infamous Tuesday Trivia for a special Beer Nerd night! Come test your knowledge of everything beer with our host Kyle Sullivan.

How much do you really know?

posts.title: PINT & Flight Night with Absolution Brewing
posts.description: Absolution Pint & Flight Night. Choose any 8 of 13 Absolution beers on tap to build your custom "Road to Absolution" craft beer flight of eight 5 oz tasters. (First 50 "flight" participants receive a free Absolution pint glass compliments of Creekside). 13 Absolution beers on tap exclusively during SFBW2018. Come to Creekside for Absolution!...and stay for Marin's Best Pizza and craft beer selection. Follow Creekside and Absolution on Taphunter app and @CreeksideSA on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter

posts.title: Federation Brewing Tap Takeover and Soul Night
posts.description: We are gearing up for a killer tap takeover and food pairing with Oakland's own Federation Brewing Company. They are going to be showcasing some of their finest and most interesting beers to go with a specialty menu we will be putting together for this event.

posts.title: Brews on the Brain – Beer Trivia
posts.description:
Are you a beer buff, a craft connoisseur, or a sudsy specialist? Gather up your brew buds and geek out at Beer Trivia!

With 6 rounds covering everything from brewing history, beer styles, craft culture, and more. Hit the books and the bars to start studying now!

BREWS ON THE BRAIN DETAILS
Specially themed for SFBW and guaranteed to challenge all kinds of beer lovers. Come early to get a seat and get a round from the bar!
- Trivia starts promptly at 7pm
- New teams and new players welcome
- Free to play
- Powered by Brainstormer Trivia - Brainstormer.com
posts.admission: Free Trivia with covetable prizes. New players welcome.

posts.title: SF Beer Week Pub Quiz
posts.description:
Join our weekly Brainstormer trivia night for a special SF Beer Week edition, packed full of fun and interesting questions to test your beer knowledge. Think you know it all? Show us what you're made of!

Free to play, drink and food specials and a chance to win lots of great prizes!

posts.title: Trivia Tuesday - Beer Edition
posts.description:
4 action packed rounds of beer related questions!

free entry - prizes

posts.title: Beer Trivia Meets Madeira-Aged Saison
posts.description: Our usual Tuesday night trivia will be guest hosted by our very own Richard Angeles! Think you know beer? Test out your knowledge for the chance to win free prizes! Sugar Magnolia will be on site cooking for us from 5-10pm. While you geek out on trivia, be the first to try out our new saison aged in Madeira barrels!

posts.title: Beer Trivia Night at OBT
posts.description: Test your knowledge of all things beer while enjoying OBT's house brews and eats! Play solo or bring your beer-geekiest friends for a chance to win fun prizes.

posts.title: Important Comedy
posts.description:
Our monthly FREE comedy show returns to the Richter Room on Tuesday, February 13th! Fill your San Francisco Beer Week itinerary with an evening of joke-em-ups and fun-fun-bits with our hosts, Jon Alcabes and Jordan Thewlis.

Doors open at 7:30pm, comedy starts at 8pm. This show is entirely FREE! Come early to snag a table for your whole crew, share a couple pitchers and let the laughs begin!

Featuring:
Ryan Goodcase
Kevin Patrick Renner
Ruby Gill
Brooke Heinichen
Jeremy Talamantes
Aviva Siegel

posts.title: Foie Gras Burger Pairing
posts.description: Celebrate Valentine's Day with an exclusive burger-beer pairing! As a one-day special we'll be offering a Foie Gras burger on our menu, and featuring a beautiful saison to pair -- Benoit Casper's Saison de Casper. Foie Gras burgers available while supplies last. Reservations encouraged!

posts.title: Not Your Basic Beach's!
posts.description: Can't take your sweetheart to a tropical destination this Valentine's Day?  Bring a bit of the beach to your sweetheart.  Featuring beers from 5 beach-town breweries and 1 collaboration brew!

posts.title: My Funky Valentine – Modern Times Tap Takeover
posts.description: An exotic beer flight from San Diego's hippest brewers? A paired cheese flight from our beautiful mongers? What could be more romantic! Grab a date, be they sexy, dank, funky, cheesy, or even a little stinky and come to Mission Cheese, where we'll be making all kinds of love happen. Check back for flight details, coming soon!

posts.title: Love at First Bite Special
posts.description:
Calicraft Brewing Co and The Counter are going to be celebrating Beer and Burgers with a unique Valentines Day experience. Paring Passion Fruit Trees, a unique Sparkling Fruited Wheat Ale with tons of Passion Fruit flavor with a white wine finish and the Love at First Bite Burger, a kitchy american classic with some Valentines Love.

Come down with your loved ones and celebrate Craft Beer, Burgers and Love.

posts.title: IPA Day
posts.description: Wednesday, we showcase the art of the IPA.  We will have singles, ryes, doubles, and even triples.  This is also the day we tap a very special brew, for which a line forms early (usually 8am). For those who have to work, we will have a fine variety of IPAs on throughout the day. The beers will change as they kick so if you come twice you may not have the same choices. Cheers!

posts.title: Dimmer Switch: Special Release
posts.description:
The only Valentine worth giving/getting is served in a cold pint glass. Join us February 14, starting at 11:30am, for the release of Dimmer Switch Chocolate Milk Stout. This annual brew is velvety, delectable and perfect to drink alone or with someone special. The addition of lactose milk sugar overloads your tastebuds with wonderful body and mild, chocolatey sweetness.

Event is free, beer costs money. Must be 21+ to consume alcohol. This event is BYO-conversation hearts.

posts.title: North Bay SFBW Collaboration Beer Release
posts.description: We will be tapping a keg of the North Bay SF Beer Week Collaboration Beer, Instant Classic. This classic West Coast IPA was a collaboration by North Bay Brewers hosted and brewed at Henhouse. Come by for a taste of community.

posts.title: Triple IPA Love Fest
posts.description: We have several triple IPAs to express our love for them on Valentine's Day. At noon we will have on tap Pliny the Younger, Sante Adairius' Of This World, and a special triple IPA from Drake's celebrating The Celebrator's 30th anniversary. Additionally, as soon as HenHouse's Big Chicken arrives, we will tap it--the whole batch will be kegged, delivered and tapped this day. And we will sell to-go cans of Alvarado Street's One Giant Leap. Open at noon.

posts.title: BIg Chicken Day from Henhouse Brewing
posts.description:
We are one of the lucky ones! On February 14, (Big Chicken Day) HenHouse Brewing Company will keg and deliver the extremely rare and desired Big Chicken, ready to be served. Once we receive the keg, we'll let you know when it's ready on Facebook (so make sure to say you are going to the facebook event and you'll be notified exactly when it comes in).

What we love about Big Chicken is that it's an opportunity for Henhouse to do something no one else can! Big Chicken this year will be hazy, it will be juicy. At just under 11%, it's dangerously balanced, you'll taste an absurd amount of hops and tropical fruit basket notes. Think overripe mango and papaya. It’s Mosaic, Simcoe, Amarillo, Pacific jade, Polaris, Citra dust, and Ekuanot dust. Stop by on Feb. 14th and try it out for yourself!

posts.title: Cooperage & HenHouse Fundraiser
posts.description:
Join us for a bunch of specialties from Cooperage and HenHouse! We will be tapping a keg of Big Chicken and have cans available as well! A portion of proceeds will be donated to North Bay fire victims. Come show some love for those who've been affected and drink for a good cause.

Check out our website or Untappd for a full draft list prior to the event.

posts.title: Maple Bourbon Barrel Aged Evil Spread Release
posts.description:
Join us as we release "Evil Spread," our Evil Twin collaboration: A breakfast spread inspired Imperial Stout aged in Blis Maple Bourbon Barrels for 1 year & then conditioned on hazelnuts, vanilla bean & cacao nibs.

We'll also be releasing “Lighten Up” Brut IPA, a new hoppy style sweeping the bay area! Light & crushable.

Growlers on the IPA, "Evil Spread" is draft only. Check out our website for many many other SFBW tappings. Cheers!

posts.title: Cellarmaker Tap Takeover + HenHouse Big Chicken Release
posts.description:
Spend your Valentine's day with the best couple ever... Pizza and Beer!

Our friends at Cellarmaker will be in the house along with 7 of their delicious beers on tap.
New Beer Smell - Pale Ale
Turok Juice - IPA
Dobis+ IPA
Coffee & Cigarettes - Smoked Coffee Porter
Orange Julian - IPA
Brute - IPA
Bourbon Vanilla Latte

We will also be tapping a special release of Henhouse Brewing's Big Chicken IIPA.

posts.title: HenHouse Brewing vs. Xingones Tacos
posts.description:
HenHouse Brewing Tap Takeover featuring the release of Big Chicken DIPA (kegged, shipped and tapped THAT DAY!), as well as these delicious beers:

Plume Royale Gose
Honest Day's Work Saison
#Stoked Pale Ale
Deep State IPA
House IPA
Dubularity Belgian Dubbel
Oyster Stout (Nitro)

Hungry? SF's favorite street taco pop up, XINGONES will be slinging their mouth watering Tacos de Birria (stewed goat tacos!) in addition to their regular menu of Carne Asada, Al Pastor, Chicken and Grilled Fish tacos!

posts.title: It’s The Wood That Makes It Good
posts.description: A showcase of wood aged beer styles ranging from fruited sours to spirit barrel aged stouts. We will have a 10 of our taps pouring specialty beers plus some awesome bottles we have been saving as well as doing bottle pours of two of this years Eclipse BA stouts from 50/50 brewing. Please join us for a flight or a pairing with our favorite spirits!

posts.title: Girl Scout Cookie Pairing
posts.description: It's that time of year. Girl Scout Cookie season. Why not take advantage of it and see what Cookies go with what type of beer?

posts.title: Bottle Release: Wonder Dust IPA & Very Best Bad Things IIPA
posts.description:
Imagine the freshest IPA you've ever had in a bottle - that's what this event is all about. We'll be bottling two of our favorite hoppy beers -- Wonder Dust IPA & Very Best Bad Things IIPA -- in the morning and releasing the bottles in our taproom that afternoon.

Try the beers on draft, meet the brewers and then take home bottles to enjoy later!

posts.title: 7S X Alvarado DIPA Can Release
posts.venue: Seven Stills + Hard Frescos - Lawton Taproom
posts.description:
This Valentine's Day we are releasing our Alvarado Street Beer Collab.

Tomahawp is a beer and a whiskey. The beer is a massive 8.5% double IPA hopped with 8.8 pounds per barrel of centennial and citra hops all in the dry hop and whirlpool to create an overwhelming juice bomb with no hop bitterness.

We will have about 30 cases of the beer available for purchase to-go and on-site consumption, and will have a couple of other kegs of Alvarado available for on-site consumption.

See you all there!

posts.title: Modern Times for Valentine's
posts.description:
Share a flight of Modern Times for Valentine's!
Celestial City
Transit of Venus
BB's Blend
Amphora
Fruitlands Passion Fruit & Guava

posts.title: Wingfest! Hot Wing Competition + Beer Week All-Stars
posts.description:
We will be having some of our favorite beers of this beer week pouring, and hot wing extravaganza!
$1 a wing or 20 for $15
All 20 draughts will be offered as flights from 11:30 til we close at midnight!
Also, for those with an iron stomach, we'll be having two hot wing eating competitions -- 7pm and 10pm. Free to enter. First 10 contestants selected. Winners get a free Richmond Republic Mug to keep on the wall, worth hundreds in free beer!

posts.title: Beer Floats & Cookie + Beer Pairings
posts.description: What could go better together than cookies and beer? What about cookies, ice cream and beer?  Indulge yourself in a mid-week comfort pairing and come down to the Torpedo Room for our craft and cookies combo.  Or treat yourself to an ice cream float made with one of our featured barrel aged stouts.  Partnering with Caia’s Cookies out of Berkeley, California, let us pour you up a truly decadent dessert.

posts.title: GFY Valentine's Day Party
posts.description:
Not feeling Valentine's Day this year? We've got your back.

Join us and other (misunderstood) souls for an evening of celebrating (lamenting) our (temporarily) single statuses at our Tap Room (safe space) on the loneliest day of the year (GFY Valentine's Day).

Things there shall be:

- Beers for tears (and plenty of new beers too,
after all, it is SF Beer Week).
- Music to help you take your mind off things
(maybe).
- $2 slices of local favorite Caprara's Pizzeria.
- An assortment of singles (you know, if you're
into that sorta thing).
- BEST OF ALL: 4 Beer Flights and Chocolate
Pairings for only $15 (just in case).

Things there shall not be:

- Dress code.
- Candles on every table.
- Romantic comedies on TV.
- Wedding proposals (most likely).
- Guys coming in off the street trying to sell
you roses.

Local gourmet organic chocolate provided by our friends at Sjaak's Organic Chocolates. You know 'em, they have a windmill too.

No reservations required. Single pets are always welcome.

posts.title: Hoppy Valentine's IPA day.
posts.description:
Single & double IPA night. Showcasing bitter & floral IPA. And possibly Hazy
5 oz tastings and proper pint pour
Local & imported cheese to pair well.
Nothing says more I love you on Valentine's than a pint of IPA
Happy hour 4-6:30pm

posts.title: Fort Point & Chill
posts.description:
We will be tapping on some super tasty Fort Point beers. A Brewer's Guild Collab and single hop specials! We know you LOVE beer, because we do!

On Tap: Single Hop "The Park"
- Mosaic Park/Pale Ale 4.7%
pacific north-west hops

- Galaxy Park/Pale Ale 4.7%
australian hops

Special Brewer's Guild Collab:
- Clarion Lager/Vienna Style 5.0%

Come and chill with Fort Point & The Hardwood Crew. We will have swag and more...........

posts.title: Speakeasy Special Beer Release
posts.description: Speakeasy Ales & Lagers will be featuring their Special/Limited edition of the infamous [insert beer name]. [enter name] from the brewery will be in the house to geek out with you about their awesome new releases and beers. Try a variety of their beers all week long for our Speakeasy Ales & Lager Tap Take Over.

posts.title: Sour Valentine's Day with Firestone Walker
posts.description: Sour Valentine's Day with Barrelmeister Jeffers Richardson of Firestone Walker.  We will be pouring some rare Firestone Walker sours along with a few others from some of our other friends. Come meet Jeffers and get sour with us!

posts.title: I <3 MWS
posts.description:
We are your date for Valentine's Day!

Come join us during SF Beer Week for a special horizontal tap takeover. We will be featuring at least 10 different versions of Milky Way Stout! Coffee MWS, Peanut Butter MWS and Barrel Aged MWS, to name a few. Hope to see you there!

posts.title: 4th Annual Battle of the Bay
posts.description:
1 trophy, 22 Bay Area Breweries. Who will dethrone last year's champion, Ghost Town?!? Come and decide! Each beer you buy will give you a ticket to vote for one brewery. Each brewery will bring one of their latest and greatest beers.

Battle of the Bay is always our funnest and rowdiest event during beer week. Many brewers and reps will be in attendance.

Featuring:
21st Amendment
Ale Industries
Almanac
Altamont
Barebottle
Benoit-Casper
Cleophus Quealy
Epidemic
Faction
Federation
Fort Point
Ghost Town
Gilman
Harmonic
Hoi Polloi
Laughing Monk
Line 51
Lucky Devil
Novel
Oakland United
Temescal
Triple Voodoo

posts.title: Cupcake & Beer Pairing
posts.description: What pairs better than cupcakes with beer? Cupcakes made with beer, obviously. Black Hammer Brewing's latest batch of beers, along with a little bit of love, are going into a fun & sweet match up. Let us take care of the pairing, you take care of enjoying our creations. Come early as supplies are limited for this event.

posts.title: Sweet & Sour Valentine Takeover
posts.description:
4th Annual Sweet & Sour Valentine Tap Takeover!
We will feature 7 breweries, each bringing 1 sweet beer and 1 sour beer, which will be paired with complimentary chocolates and confections.
Get a mini flight by brewery!
This Valentine's celebrate your love of beer, no Valentine required!

posts.title: Whiskey Barrel-aged Porter Release
posts.description:
Celebrate the day of love and partnership with our Bender's Whiskey barrel-aged porter. Sure-fire successful date, guaranteed. Well, ok really that's up to you, not us, but we'll do our part with this lovingly delicious beer.

Separate food pairing event happening the same night!

posts.title: Shades of Black Tuesday:  Sipping Session with The Bruery
posts.description:
Delve into the flavors that make up The Bruery's legendary "Black Tuesday"-a masterpiece of a barrel-aged Imperial Stout if we've ever met one.  Featured pours:

-So Happens It's Tuesday
-Grey Monday
-Mocha Wednesday
-and more

We'll arm you with enticing Bruery package to cart home including cans from their Offshoot line of beer. Friends from the brewery will be barside to high five.

posts.title: An Evening with SF’s Local Brewing
posts.description: Come enjoy an awesome lineup of fresh craft beers from San Francisco's own Local Brewing, including new hazy IPAs, sours, and their Sutro Tower Stout aged 4 months in Buffalo Trace barrels

posts.title: Dandelion Chocolate Pairing
posts.description:
Valentines Day Beer & Chocolate Pairing with Dandelion Chocolates

What says romance better than chocolate & beer?! The answer is: NOTHING! Local favorite chocolate company Dandelion Chocolates will be in house serving up the goods and we will be providing the beer! There will be 4 chocolates and 4 beers with each ticket purchase. Dandelion staff will be onsite to explain the subtle nuances of their pairings and the head brewer will be onsite to explain the beer side of things.

posts.title: Midwest / Central Coast Brewery Night 40 taps 10 breweries
posts.description:
Mikkeller Main Bar and Public Sour Room Flights
4-12pm with special beer tappings at 6 pm.

Featuring Silva Brewing and a Special New Belgium Foudre Series Blending

This is a "Tap Take Over" that will feature limited beers from some of best Midwestern and Colorado breweries to be matched twenty to twenty with our own Central coast breweries of California. We will also be featuring the new brewery Silva Brewing from the CC. Silva Brewery is out of Paso Robles and is the creation of Chuck Silva the former head brewer at Green Flash. For this evening we wanted to offer beers that do not make it to the bay area very often or were sent specially from breweries that we support year round. Participating breweries include but are not limited to Perennial, Prairie, New Belgium, Avery, Silva Brewing, Alvarado, Central Coast, Barrelhouse, Libertine, Casa Agria along with more breweries to come, so stay tuned.

Most Breweries are sending a special brewery only keg and the best they could spare. Some amazing beers for this event are in the lineup. For example, Casa Agria is sending "Huesito" a perfect apricot sour which is a member only beer and Prairie is sending Barrel Aged Bomb.


In the Sour room open to the public will be a New Belgium Flight.

New Belgium Foudre Felix. (Felix is a foudre created beer that is the base beer for 5 of New Belgium’s limited sour beers. We will offer the opportunity to purchase all of the finished beers that use Felix as their base beer) The sour room will be open and this is not a ticketed event.

posts.title: Bitter Sour Single
posts.description: Does this sound like you? Bitter, Sour or Single. If so, join us for our anti-Valentine’s Day party. We will be featuring bitter and sour style beers.

posts.title: Barrel Aged Beers
posts.description: We're filling the taps with a selection of killer barrel aged beers from Founders, Firestone Walker, Dionysus, Lost Abbey, North Coast, Modern Times, Midnight Sun, Pelican & Tilquin.

posts.title: Drake's Brewing Co. Night
posts.description:
Drake's Brewing Co. takes over the bar as part of our San Francisco Beer Week festivities! Free Drake's Brewing Co. glassware while supplies last. Be one of the first 20 guests at the bar starting at 5:00 p.m. sharp and receive free Drake's Brewing Co. merch!

We'll be pouring:

1500 Pale Ale
Aroma Coma IPA
Dark Wing Black IPA
Denogginizer DIPA
Drake's IPA
Flyway Pils
Ghostride the Wheat White IPA
Hefe
Hopocalypse Black Label Triple IPA
Hopocalypse Green Label DIPA
Robusto Porter
Rye Robustito Porter
Thizz Face IPA

posts.title: Marin Brewing – Beer, Soul, & Cheese
posts.description:
Enjoy some incredible brews from one of the Bay Area's most established and reputable award-winning breweries.

Brewmaster Arne Johnson will surely be hanging with us, pairing his beers with yummy cheeses from both near and afar!

Beer veteran DJ Slopoke will also be in the house spinning old 45s of your favorite soul and R&B classics.

Sample draught list: (subject to change)
~Hella Art Wah Pilsner
~Limey Saison
~3 Flowers Rye IPA
~Recreational IPA
~FBIPA, Double IPA
~#nofilterbananasplitbock, Oakland United Collab
~Point Reyes Porter
~"Flake News," Russian Imperial Oatmeal Stout
~Rotten to the Core, Bourbon BBL aged strong wild wheat ale with apple juice
~Cuvée Rogé, BBL aged sour wild ale

posts.title: Self-Distribution Alliance Tap Takeover & Brewer Games
posts.description: Keeping the craft beer scene alive and hyper local, the Self Distribution Alliance returns this year to Cato's Ale House with another outstanding lineup. Come down and join Ale Industries, Alameda Island Brewing Co., Federation, Ghost Town, Gilman, and Old Kan as they dominate 18 taps! And did we mention we'll have the front patio cleared for Olympic Brewer Games? Come down, grab a pint, and chat it up with some of your favorite local breweries.

posts.title: We Love SFBW Valentine’s Day 30 Tap Takeover
posts.venue: Beer Thirty Bottle Shop & Pour House
posts.description:
We are in LOVE with San Francisco Bay craft breweries and want to celebrate SF Beer Week with you and your Sweetheart(s) on Valentine's Day! We'll be hosting a 30-Tap LOVE Invasion of special beers from the Bay in honor of one of the countries most celebrated beer events!! We'll have a special treat on draft & cans from some local collaborating breweries. Olive + Coyote Flower Truck will be here fresh bunches and The Carpo's Restaurant Window will be open with some delightful dishes! Check out the line-up below..

Alpha Acid Brewing
Almanac Beer Company
Barebottle Brewing Company
Black Hammer Brewing
Fort Point Beer Company
Harmonic Brewing
Laughing Monk Brewing
Redwood Coast Cider
The San Francisco Mead Company
Seven Stills

We'll be pouring a SFBW collaboration, a Salted Caramel Stout called 'A Bay Of Our Own' by local friends below..

Discretion Brewing
Brewery Twenty Five
Corralitos Brewing Company
New Bohemia Brewing Company
Santa Cruz Mountain Brewing
Shanty Shack Brewing

Cheers ~

posts.title: Double the Funk: Wild Beers & Natural Wines
posts.description: Divine Origins is our genre-bending odyssey into the unexplored worlds of natural wine, spontaneous fermentation, and barrel aging. After long collaborative work with local vintners and months hidden away in our Treasure Island barrel room, these special wine-beer hybrids blink into the daylight.

posts.title: Double the Funk: Wild Beers & Natural Wines
posts.description: Brettanomyces! That funky, fruity, wild yeast embraced by renegade brewers, feared by the straight-laced wine world. ...Until now! Come taste our mixed fermentation beers paired with the latest cutting-edge crop of wild-fermented wines — a funked-up world of flavor!

posts.title: Beer Lovers Prix Fixe Pairing Dinner
posts.description:
Impress your Valentine with a unique and romantic experience at Brotzeit Lokal. Our breathtaking waterfront views and cozy ambiance is sure to bring you close to the one you love.

Indulge in a select SF Beer Week German brew flight for two, Appetizer, Salad, Schweinshaxe meal for two, and two desserts. Tantalize your senses with a truly great start to your Valentines evening.

posts.title: Valentine's Day with Eagle Rock Brewing
posts.description: We’ll have a lineup of 6 beers, most seldom seen in the bay area, from the super talented folks at Eagle Rock (Los Angeles).  They’ll be on hand to answer questions and talk shop!

posts.title: Alvarado + Seven Stills Beer + Whiskey Release and Takeover
posts.description:
This Valentine's Day we are releasing our Alvarado Street Beer and Whiskey Collab.

Tomahawp is a beer and a whiskey. The beer is a massive 8.5% double IPA hopped with 8.8 pounds per barrel of centennial and citra hops all in the dry hop and whirlpool to create an overwhelming juice bomb with no hop bitterness.

The whiskey is the same beer but distilled and aged in new American Oak.

This is the first time that we have ever had a collaboration beer and whiskey in a can/bottle!

posts.title: St. Valentine’s Day Liver Massacre w. North Coast Brewing
posts.description: Whether you've got a date or not for Valentine's Day, hangin' with North Coast at Naked Lunch is simply a solid idea. We'll be pouring their Cranberry Quince Berliner Weisse, Class of '88 Barleywine, Beachmaster Imperial IPA, Old Stock Reserve, & Barrel Aged Rasputin 20th Anvrsry.  Hell yeah!

posts.title: 24th St. Three-Way: Beer, Donut & Ice Cream Night
posts.description: Valentine's Day can be the worst -- we want to make it better. Join us for an anti-Valentine's Day celebration with all the deliciousness that’s made on 24th Street! We’re inviting in Dynamo Donut and Humphry Slocombe Ice Cream to spread the love. We’ll be serving our Dynamo Donut Stout (Brewed with Maple Syrup, Smoked Malt & Donuts) and epic specials: Donut Cheeseburgers, Ice Cream Donut Sandwiches and a Beer Ice Cream “Affogato.” No RSVP, tickets, or prix fixe menus - just come stag, with a date, or two.

posts.title: Hunka Burnin' Love
posts.description: Hunka Burnin' Love Valentines Day celebration with Berryessa Brewing Co. & Sierra Nevada Brewing Co. with honky tonk love songs on 78's spun by the one and only Cactus Pete and his 78-rpm roundup.

posts.title: Double the Funk: Wild Beers & Wild Wines
posts.description: Brettanomyces! That funky, fruity, wild yeast embraced by renegade brewers, feared by the straight-laced wine world. ...Until now! Come taste our mixed fermentation beers paired with the latest cutting-edge crop of wild-fermented wines — a funked-up world of flavor!

posts.title: Flanders Red Release – Good Food Awards Winner
posts.description:
Southpaw will be releasing our Good Food Award Winner, the Flanders Red Ale, as a special Valentine's Day present to all you barrel-aged beer lovers.

This red ale was aged for a year in a Barbera barrel. We've only got two kegs, so don't miss out on tasting this incredibly special beer.

We'll be serving up our beer brined wings and baby back ribs tossed in our Stupid, Spicy Flanders Red BBQ Sauce.

posts.title: Barebottle Homebrew Competition
posts.venue: Floodcraft Brewing Co. at Whole Foods Market - The Alameda
posts.address: 777 The Alameda, San Jose, CA 95126, San Jose
posts.description:
YOU will help us pick the winner between 2 contenders in the "Magic in a Bottle" contest.

Every customer that orders the 2-beer flight will get to vote for their favorite beer.

posts.title: Galentine’s Day – A Ladies’ Night By Ladies For Ladies
posts.description:
Embrace your inner Leslie Knope, because this night is all about ladies celebrating ladies! The women of Temescal Brewing are partnering with the Bay Area chapter of Pink Boots Society to throw a party in honor of women who love beer, complete with an all-lady bartending staff, food vendor, and entertainment.

We’ll be featuring two one-night-only pink beers on cask, with $1 from each pint supporting Pink Boots Society’s mission to help advance careers for women beer industry professionals by raising money for educational scholarships.

Lady-owned, lady-run El Sabrosito will be slinging their killer Salvadoran pupusas, our lady DJs will be on deck spinning exclusively female artists, and we’ll also have a photobooth for making memories with your gal pals.

posts.title: East Brother Beer Tap Takeover
posts.description:
Please excuse us as we take over the place!

Ever been to Mill Valley's Boo Koo? If not, today's the day to try the delicious Southeast Asian with California flair! If so, you know why East Brother Beer Co. invading this gem's taps and grill! Come party with us as we take over their draft system with our brews and enjoy food prepared with East Brother beer blended right in!

posts.title: 7S X Alvarado Street Beer + Whiskey Release Party
posts.description:
This Valentine's Day we are releasing our Alvarado Street Beer and Whiskey Collab.

Tomahawp is a beer and a whiskey. The beer is a massive 8.5% double IPA hopped with 8.8 pounds per barrel of centennial and citra hops all in the dry hop and whirlpool to create an overwhelming juice bomb with no hop bitterness.

The whiskey is the same beer but distilled and aged in new American Oak.

This is the first time that we have ever had a collaboration beer and whiskey in a can/bottle!

posts.title: Sweet and Sour Valentine
posts.description:
Lovers, singles, online daters and the “it’s complicated” alike, join us on Wednesday 2/14 at Zeitgeist for our Sweet and Sour Valentine Event.

With 14 sour beers from local brewers on tap and a sweet food pairing to match, make your Valentine's worth remembering this year.

All proceeds from the featured sour brews will be matched by Zeitgeist as a charitable donation to the the Mayor’s Fund for the Homeless. The MFH provides food, shelter and support services to homeless families and individuals in San Francisco. These funds are also used to help support clients who are exiting the mission Navigation Center.

Drink Beer and Give Back at Zeitgeist all week during SF Beer Week 2018. For all of our events during Beer Week, Zeitgeist is giving back to the SF community by matching our event sales as a charitable contribution.

More details at Zeitgeist_SF on Insta, Zeitgeist_SF on Facebook. Full Zeitgeist SF Beer Week menu on Untappd!

posts.title: HenHouse Big Chicken Release Party
posts.description: Release party for Hen House brewery’s Big Chicken double IPA. The freshest beer you can find. Once it gets here..... we’re putting it on! Can release as well.

posts.title: An Evening with Alvarado Street Brewery
posts.description: Our friends at Alvarado Street Brewery will be taking over our taps here at The Crafty Fox Ale House. Your tap list for the evening is TBC

posts.title: Boneyard Beer Company Tap Takeover
posts.description: Tap Takeover by Boneyard Beer! Event starts at 5:00pm, check out what special limited beers we got for you.

posts.title: Big Chicken Love
posts.description:
We are psyched to announce that we will be a part of HenHouse Brewing's annual Big Chicken Double IPA release on Feb 14! For those who don’t know, HenHouse will transfer Big Chicken from their tanks to kegs early in the morning on 2/14 and then run the kegs out to participating bars throughout the Bay Area, where they will be immediately tapped and give drinkers the experience of drinking a beer that is as fresh as it can be. And what a beer it will be - a 10+% Imperial IPA with crazy amounts of late addition hops!

Because it's Valentine's day and we all will be filled with loving feelings, we will be pairing Big Chicken Double IPA with our Paulista Big Fried Chicken Sandwich and Paulista Big Chicken Skewers.

So, the CHICKEN will be BIG all the way around. What a night!

posts.title: Menagerie of Distinguished Drinkers Welcome Party
posts.description:
Dearest Distinguished Drinkers, you are cordially invited to the very first Menagerie event of the year! This is a private event for our membership club, The Menagerie of Distinguished Drinkers, featuring special beer week brews and the unveiling of exclusive Menagerie 2018 merch.

Since our welcome shindig falls on Valentine’s Day, we’re throwing a party complete with all the over-the-top glitz of a high school dance. Dress in your best sequin and tulle dress or powder blue tux, strike a pose against our Valentine’s Day photo wall, and kick up your heels to the finest love ballads the 80s had to offer. All that’s missing is that bottle of peppermint schnapps you swiped from your folks’ liquor cabinet to drink under the bleachers (or was that just us?). Instead, we’ll have our special Beer Week releases on tap, including Cherry Red, Sahti, and POG Saison.

This beery prom party is just for members of the 2018 Menagerie of Distinguished Drinkers. If you’d like to join in the fun, visit http://www.cleoph.us/membership/ to sign up!

Members, this will also be your first chance to pick up all your sweet new Menagerie swag!

What is the Menagerie of Distinguished Drinkers? Only the best cadre of tipplers, a community rooted in the principles of good beer, better friends, and exceptional experiences. Membership in this social club includes invites to exclusive events all year long, members-only swag, 10% off your tab until 2019, and good times with fellow Cleophus Quealy devotees over some of the finest low country-inspired libations this side of the Bay. There is still time to join, but spots are limited, so don’t hesitate! Find more information at: http://www.cleoph.us/membership/

posts.title: Double the Funk: Wild Beers & Natural Wines
posts.description: Brettanomyces! That funky, fruity, wild yeast embraced by renegade brewers, feared by the straight-laced wine world... Until now! Come taste our mixed fermentation beers paired with the latest cutting-edge crop of wild-fermented wines — a funked-up world of flavor!

posts.title: Imperial Night ft. '14, ’15, ’16, '17 FiftyFifty Eclipse BA Stouts
posts.description:
Tonight, we feature imperials of all types....

The highlight of the evening is the much sought after FiftyFifty Brewing Imperial Stout series. Brewed in small 300 gallons batches, FiftyFifty brewers lovingly craft this masterpiece once a year, using over 18 separate ingredients and aging it in oak bourbon barrels for a minimum of 180 days. You'll pick up dark chocolate, espresso, oak with hints of vanilla and coconut, mild hops, then tobacco, dark dried fruit and more chocolate on the finish. Check out the absolutely bonkers lineup:

posts.title: Half Moon Bay Tap Takeover
posts.description: Half Moon Bay taking over out taps for one night! If you love their Full Swing IPA, you are in for a treat. We'll be featuring Full Swing, Swing for the Fences XXIPA and The Bat Flip XXXIPA. Also find on tap a special Coastside Collab, their Amber and Calf-eine milk stout.

posts.title: Jungle Cruise Release
posts.description:
On this night, we'll be releasing the 2018 version of our beloved Jungle Cruise Triple IPA.
This beer is basically a tiki drink in a beer; absurdly tropical with notes of fresh papaya, pineapple, pinch of coconut, and an excotic dank little kick in a boozy glass of juicy triple IPA. Welcome to the jungle, baby!

posts.title: pH1 Beer Dinner
posts.description:
pH1 is the name of a barrel. Crafted from French oak in 1990, she’s traveled from brewery to brewery, positively shaping every beer she touches.

pH1 is an idea. The idea is that there is one barrel that’s better than the rest. She’s better than the rest because she is the perfect home for the perfect mix of yeast and bacteria.

pH1 is the original rare barrel, whose story inspired us to search for that perfect barrel with the perfect mix of yeast and bacteria.

We will be exploring pH1’s influence on sour beer and showcasing some of the fruits of her labor throughout this beer dinner. Our intention is for guests to enjoy the destination as much as we have enjoyed her journey. Check out the details below.

Seatings | Each seating is intended to provide a more intimate dining experience for you to enjoy the beer, food, and shared company.
Seating 1 | 5PM - 7PM
Seating 2 | 8PM - 10PM

Ticket Price & What’s Included | $175 + tax (includes gratuity)
Each ticket will include a 5 courses paired with 5 sours including a serving of The Rare Barrel’s bottled release pH1. In addition to the beer dinner, each attendee will receive 1 bottle of pH1 to take home. This is a single barrel release with less than 200 bottles in existence. This will be the only chance to take home a bottle of this limited beer since bottles of pH1 will not be sold and will likely only be available for special events.

How to Purchase | Click here to enter the 24 hour lottery at 9AM Pacific on Wednesday, January 24th.
Due to the limited amount of tickets per seating we will be holding a lottery for tickets. This lottery will be open to the public and sold through our shop page. Please see details on lottery entry below.
1 entry per person, duplicates will be removed
No entries will be accepted after the lottery closes
Entry does not guarantee your ticket
32 lottery winners will be randomly selected and contacted by 12PM Pacific on Thursday, January 25th.
Winners will be required to purchase their ticket within 24 hours in order to secure their seat.

posts.description:

posts.title: 2nd Annual Shot Through The Tart, and You’re To Blame…
posts.description:
Since we happen to be a beer bar on Valentine’s Day during SFBW again, we are collecting some sour beer to feature on this day. We will be featuring California breweries that are excelling in creating beers in this style.

Last year this event was wildly popular, so we would highly recommend making a reservation in advance through OpenTable, or call us directly.

posts.title: Juice Fest
posts.description:
Celebrating the juiciest and haziest beers of the Bay. Come down to Mission Bay for a special night at Casey's Pizza showcasing the Bay Area's tastiest New England style IPAs.

Featuring Alvarado Street, New Glory, Barebottle, Harmonic, Revision and others. All paired with a special Beer Week menu of hot pies. Pints, flights and cans.

posts.title: Nuit de Quebec with Poutine
posts.description: I scream, you scream, we all scream for Poutine! We will be featuring Montreal & Quebec brewers and a full menu of Poutine. Poutine is the Quebecois favorite of crispy french fries tossed with cheese curds, toppings and smothered with our housemade gravy. Magnifique!

posts.title: Beer + Chocolate, What Else?
posts.description: Homemade chocolate pretzels paired with our 14 month Woodford Reserve bourbon barrel aged Imperial Stout, Damage Inc.

posts.title: Feel the Love w. Altamont, Fieldwork, Boneyard & Faction
posts.description:
Celebrate an amazing line-up of brews from our good friends Altamont, Fieldwork, Boneyard & Faction! Love the suds!
Line-up TBA

posts.title: Beer + Data 101 with Fort Point and the USF Data Institute
posts.description:
Dive into the data of beer with Fort Point and USF's Data Institute.

Does beer really taste different from a can versus a keg? How does Fort Point use data to optimize efficiency from production to delivery?

Learn more from the experts at the Data Institute, along with Fort Point founder Justin Catalana. Plus, enjoy a tasting of some of Fort Point's newest styles including KSA, Animal, and Resonance.

posts.title: Valentine’s Day Beer and Chocolate Pairing
posts.description:
Join us for a very special Valentine's Day beer and chocolate pairing in partnership with our friends from Recchiuti Confections. We will be pairing four beers with four of Recchiuti's finest truffles. More details to come!
Tickets include a taster flight with four beers paired with four truffles.

For more information on Recchiuti Confections offerings you can go to their website here: http://www.recchiuti.com/flavors.html
Be sure to buy your tickets in advance!

We will also be hosting the monthly SF Brewers Guild Meet The Brewers along with the Drink SF Beer Shuttle. Brewers from the SF Brewers Guild will be hanging out to chat and answer questions. The FREE Drink SF shuttle starts at 7pm and will take you to breweries in the Dogpatch and Bayview.

posts.title: Sweet Heart Night featuring Absolution Brewing Company
posts.description:
Sweet Heart Night! Treat your Valentine to a dinner pairing in the Heart of Marin: Creekside Pizza & Taproom. A great meal pairing for a sweet pair: Absolution's Strawberry Trespasser Belgian Ale (only on tap during SFBW2018), Creekside's favorite Sweet Heart Salad and our Heart of Marin signature craft pizza.

Over a dozen Absolution craft beers on Tap Takeover at Creekside. Come get some.

Follow Creekside and Absolution on Taphunter app and @CreeksideSA on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter.

posts.title: F*ck Valentine’s Day – LOVE Beer
posts.description:
Tired of cliché chocolate, flowers, forced candlelit dinners, and sappy “I Love you more than life itself cards?” So are we, so come join us in saying, "F*ck Valentine’s Day, LOVE Beer!"

We'll run a $1 off special on our Dark and Sour beers for "Dark and Sour Hearts!" and we’ll also have Voodoo Dolls for you to decorate and stick in honor of your not-so-favorite-people while you rock to our playlist of anti-love songs.

F*ck Valentine’s Day, LOVE Beer. Yeah, we like that, ‘cause that’s how we roll.

posts.title: Fort Point Special Release
posts.description: Bring loved ones this Valentine's Day to meet the brewer and enjoy some new local SF beers from Fort Point Beer Co.

posts.title: Beer, Wine & Valentine Dinner
posts.description:
Happy Valentine's Day!

Join us for a special prix fixe dinner of four courses, each with a beer vs. wine pairing of a Bay Area beer and a French wine.

Courses & pairings:

~Seared scallop in hot sauce beurre blanc; paired with Magnolia Yuzu Kalifornia Kolsch vs. Michel Dervin Blanc De Noirs Champagne Brut

~Salade lyonniase with slow-cooked egg; paired with Henhouse Big Chicken vs. Domaine Allimant-Laugner Sylvaner

~Petite filet with red wine reduction and duck fat fingerling potatoes; paired with Drake's Cherryland vs. Domaine de Familongue Coteaux du Languedoc

~Chocolate crepe with citrus crème anglaise; paired with 21st Amendment Strawberry Mountain Jam vs. Chateau Grillon Sauternes

$55 per guest + gratuity
Space limited; tickets required
Ages 21+
https://bwvalentine.brownpapertickets.com/

We will be CLOSED to the public for this ticketed event.

* We're one of a the Bay Area bars releasing HenHouse's Big Chicken IIIPA this evening. Big Chicken is a 10% ABV, once-a-year-release, Triple IPA from one of Sonoma's top producers! It's not to be missed.

* We've got "Just Jacquie" popping up in the kitchen with some excellent Valentine's Day specialities that'll pair beautifully with all the special beer we'll have on draft from all our previous SFBW events! Check out the menu:

posts.description: In the past, you had fallen in love with the 21A's Cheese Curds and now we've taken that a step further. Join us on Valentine's Day with your other, solo or friends and enjoy our Strong Beer Month specially paired with a variety of flavored cheese curds from our friends at Ellsworth Cooperative Creamery. It's a cheese curd love fest.

posts.title: Fall Brewing & Fieldwork: California Love
posts.description:
The third installment of San Francisco Beer Week 2018 events is very close to our hearts so join us on Valentine's Day for some California Love!

Hailing from Berkeley California, our dear friends at Fieldwork are beloved in the greater bay area and beyond for their forward thinking and progressive offerings.

At their special request we have invited our new friends Fall Brewing from North Park in San Diego to join in on the fun for this very special evening.

We will have 5 beers on draft from each brewery and some sweet treats to pair with their beer so whether you're single or have a sweetheart, we hope to see you there!

posts.title: Stouts & Sweets - Mini-Beerwalk
posts.description:
Stouts & Sweets - part of the Mini Beerwalk Series

Celebrate Valentine's Day like never before!

Taste 4 different stout beers from 4 different breweries paired with 4 different sweets from local shops at 4 different watering holes in Downtown Campbell.

NO TICKET NECESSARY!
RSVP appreciated.
Simply grab a souvenier glass for only $5 (or bring and use any Beerwalk glass from past Beerwalks) at any of the 4 participating locations and 4 participating breweries between 6pm - 9pm and make your own course!

Stop at all 4 places or stay at one!

Pay for each 5oz stout and/or sweet as you go!

LOCATIONS:
Spread Deli & Bottles
Boiler Maker
Tessora's Barra di Vino
Khartoum

BREWERIES:
Barebottle Brewing Company
Anderson Valley Brewing Company
Knee Deep Brewing Company
... and more.

DESSERTS:
Snake & Butterfly
Frost Cupcake Factory
... and more!

a SF Beer Week event
#beerwalk #downtowncampbell #sfbeerweek

Note: Designated drivers do not need to purchase tickets. Kids (strollers) and dogs are welcome, but may not be allowed in some tasting locations. This is at the discretion of each pouring location and the city. The purchase charge will show up as The Beerwalk on your bank statement. The Beerwalk is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization.

Disclaimer: ALL SALES ARE FINAL - NO REFUNDS. Rain or Shine. Must be 21 years old or older. Drinks must be consumed inside the tasting locations. We do not guarantee that everyone will make it to every tasting location. All breweries, beers, and participating businesses are subject to change. Signature glassware is not guaranteed. We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone. Please drink responsibly.

posts.title: Valentine's Chocolate Making + Beer Pairing for Charity
posts.description:
Berkeley's very own TCHO Chocolate Company, Pete Slosberg (Pete’s Wicked Ale and Cocoa Pete’s), and ThirstyBear team up for a chocolate making and beer pairing evening!

Enjoy all our organic ThirstyBear beers; a special SF Brewers Guild collaboration brew; savory bites and tastes of chocolates while learning to make your own!

Judging and prizes for best chocolate and Panda Bear beer pairing!

Proceeds benefit the Institute for Myeloma & Bone Cancer Research.

This event sells out every year, so get your tickets now. $50/person, limited to 36 people.

Jøin us før sømething different øn Vålentines Dåy. posts.title: Liquid Love in a Can
posts.description:
Whether you're feeling a little lonely or looking for something laid back and fun to do with your sweetheart on Valentine's Day, we have the event for you. Please join us for our 8th annual craft beer in can tasting, we will be pouring 25-30 beers of varying styles. Come explore the absolute supremacy of this package and the amazing beer now available in a can. Share with that special someone (or wash your sorrows away) Wednesday the 14th, at Jug Shop's Liquid Love in a Can tasting.

See you there!

posts.title: Drink SF Beer Shuttle + Meet the Brewers: Dogpatch Edition
posts.description:
For this special edition of the SF Brewers Guild's monthly Meet the Brewers night, host Triple Voodoo (2245 3rd St.) is readly to keep the new year grooving as we explore breweries in the fast-growing Dogpatch neighborhood.

The major highlight of the evening is the FREE Drink SF Beer shuttle, which will loop nonstop between:

-- Triple Voodoo Brewery
-- Harmonic Brewing Co.
-- Speakeasy Ales & Lager
-- Smokestack, headquarters of Magnolia Brewing Co.

At 6:30pm, a shuttle will depart from each of these Dogpatch breweries, then circle continuously between the venues, stopping at each location every 10-15 minutes -- making it easy to hop on, hop off at any stop.

There will be a BUNCH of new and special releases on tap at all these locations -- including Dogpatch neighborhood collaboration 'concept' beers whereby each brewery does its interpretation of a brew showcasing Admiral Maltings and (non-psychoactive) terpenes -- as all four locations celebrate #SFBeerWeek.

So join us as we celebrate SF Beer Week, and check out the full 2018 Drink SF Beer schedule at: http://drinksfbeer.com

posts.title: Tacolicious Crab + Cold Ones
posts.description:
Join us for our annual Valentine's Day roasted crab + cold-ones dinner, this year featuring beers from HenHouse Brewing. Look deeply into each others eyes, drink beer, lick spicy crab from your fingers, and fall deeply in love.

MENU

• MEXICAN-STYLE CLAM CHOWDER charred poblanos, bacon
• WINTER CHOPPED SALAD chicories, gorgonzola
• ROASTED DUNGENESS CRAB fennel, thyme, chile
• HORCHATA POT DE CREME

$120 includes tip (tickets available on EventBrite or through Tacolicious Facebook).

posts.title: Valentines & Beer Trivia Night
posts.description: As always every Wednesday night at 7pm we host trivia night.  This year is special because it just happens to fall on Valentine's Day.  So bring your sweetheart out for a night of beer, trivia, and chocolate!

posts.title: Big Chicken + Big Stouts
posts.description: We are tapping Henhouse's yearly release of Big Chicken triple IPA as well as some select super sized stout special releases. You wanna get big? Just ask Zoltar and come to Brewcade!

posts.title: Lost Abbey Food Pairing
posts.description: Join us for a very special Valentines Day as we host one of our favorite food trucks, Elisa's Favors of Cali, and one of our favorite breweries, The Lost Abbey, for an evening with delicious bites paired with some rare and delicious offerings from The Lost Abbey barrel program.

posts.title: Brewing with the Ones You Love
posts.description:
If you haven't already figured this out, we really love beer. A lot. That's in no small part because we also love the people who make beer. There's no community quite like the brewing community and what better day to recognize and celebrate our love for our brewing friends and family than Valentine's Day?

We've lined up a special list of beers (and brewers) that together tell a story of love, friendship and collaboration in the beer world. We'll have limited release beers from our new extended family of New Belgium Brewing and Oud Beersel along with a growing list from other usual suspects like 21st Amendment (February being Strong Beer Month, after all). Check back as we will update the beer list as the event gets closer.

posts.title: Brews on the Brain - Beer Trivia
posts.description:
Are you a beer buff, a craft connoisseur, or a sudsy specialist? Gather up your brew buds and geek out at Beer Trivia!

With 6 rounds covering everything from brewing history, beer styles, craft culture, and more. Hit the books and the bars to start studying now!

BREWS ON THE BRAIN DETAILS
Specially themed for SFBW and guaranteed to challenge all kinds of beer lovers. Come early to get a seat and get a round from the bar!
- Trivia starts promptly at 7pm
- New teams and new players welcome
- Free to play
- Powered by Brainstormer Trivia - Brainstormer.com
posts.admission: Free Trivia with covetable prizes. New players welcome.

posts.title: 21st Amendment & Drakes - Fried Chicken & Beer
posts.description:
Choose your beer, choose your chicken -- Dual tap takeover with East Bay Breweries 21st Amendment and Drakes Brewing. 4505 will be serving our signature smoked fried chicken, and a special Nashville Hot Chicken. Come meet the brewers, pick your favorite beers, and choose your chicken!
All day, 10:30am- 10pm

posts.title: The South Bay’s Favorite SF IPA
posts.description: All our favorite San Francisco Brewers will be sending their favorite IPAs.  We will be serving blind flights and asking you to vote for your favorite.  The winner will be announced at 8 pm.  Brewery reps will be on hand to answer questions and influence the voters.  Featured breweries include Laughing Monk, Almanac, Fort Point, 21st Amendment and more!

posts.title: San Diego Night
posts.venue: Tap Room at Whole Foods Market Santa Clara
posts.description:
San Diego is taking over our taps!
Special treats and some good ol’ trusty favorites all day from SD.

Brewery List:
Modern Times
Mike Hess
Pizza Port
Coronado
Lost Abbey
...and more!

posts.title: Festival of Firkins
posts.description:
One of our favorite events now in it's 10th year!

Spend your day with us, sampling as many cask-conditioned ales as we can fit into our cellar and on top of the bar for the day.

Beginning at 11am and running as long as the beer lasts, we'll have at least a dozen real ales flowing, all carefully sourced, cellared, vented, and tapped. Look for a few of our own, of course, plus a selection from our craft brewer brethren who share this obsession with us. Drink them by the pint or in smaller tastes that allow you to try a few different beers.

posts.title: Flight School with Temescal Brewing Co
posts.description: Enjoy 5 Temescal brews paired up with 5 American cheeses and let your taste buds take flight! The brewer will be on site from 4-6PM to chat about his brewing philosophy and help guide you on your flavor journey.

posts.title: Drake's Hopocalypse Day
posts.description:
Everyone knows when its SFBW time, it's also some Drake's Hopocalypse time! on tap we'll have

·Black Label
·Green Label
·White Label
·Thizz Face
·Ghost Ride The Wheat
·Cherryland
+ Many more Drake's goodies!

posts.title: Henhouse Tap Takeover
posts.description: Henhouse tap takeover! Henhouse, Moonlight, and Sonoma Springs flights available. Drink for a cause. $1 from every beer or flight will be donated to the Sonoma fire relief via Undocufund, an organization helping our undocumented neighbors in sonoma county that lost their homes and places of employment in the fires last october.

posts.title: Bay Day Tap Takeover
posts.description: We love to support local brewers at the Rose, and so on this day we do exactly that. We will hold all Bay Area Tap Takeover. Unlike our other events, we will showcase all types of beers that breweries have given us to show off their talents.  Breweries include Palo Alto Brewing Co, Highwater, Altamont, Fieldwork, Faction, Laughing Monk, and more.  Join us in a great time in getting to know your bay area brewers.

posts.title: Armstrong Brewing Porter Beer Release
posts.description: We haven't done a beer release in awhile, so join us for the first of 2018 as we release our new porter!

posts.title: Alaskan Smoked Porter Vertical
posts.description: One of the best beers to cellar, Alaskan Smoked Porter is preserved by the smoke it contains. We have three vintages: current, 2010 and 1998. Come in and explore how this sleeper of a beer can transform into something akin to Sherry. Flights poured from noon until we run out.

posts.title: The Many Shades of Pale
posts.description: Do you know the difference between bottled, cask-conditioned, and draught Pale Ale? Did you even know such a difference existed? Come compare our three variations on an historic beer with a pale ale flight and learn about the history of our most classic ale.

posts.title: All Oakland Brewery Tap Takeover
posts.description:
Come celebrate Oakland beer in all it's glory as we fill all of our 24 taps with beer brewed right here in Oakland!

Oakland Breweries Participating:

- Ale Industries
- Crooked City Cider
- Federation Brewing
- Ghost Town Brewing
- Independent Brewing Company
- Novel Brewing Company
- Oakland United Beerworks
- Old Kan Beer and Co.
- Temescal Brewing
- Woods Beer Co.

It would have been difficult to fill all 24 of our taps with Oakland beer even just a year ago, but with more and more awesome Oakland beer being brewed, it is time to go all-Oakland at Paulista! We will tap the kegs at 12pm on Thursday afternoon, 2/15, and do our very best to finish them off when we close at 11pm on 2/16. Come and join us!

posts.title: Meet the Brewers & the Maltsters ft. Admiral Maltings
posts.description:
Harmonic Brewing brings you an education night like no other!

The entire Admiral Maltings crew will be in house giving talks about their malting process and their beliefs in using locally sourced product. They will be doing a hot steep of their malt for everyone to try free! And they will be featured in a number of beers here on tap in the tap room.

Admiral Maltings opened in 2017 and is the first & only malting facility here in California. Dont know what that means? Perfect! Come by and learn what makes that beer you drink so special.

The Harmonic brew team will be onsite as well, walking you through our process of making beer and our facility. There will be plenty of opportunity to ask all the questions you would like. Come meet the brewers and maltsters over here at the tap room.

posts.title: Brouwerij West Tap Takeover at Gus’s
posts.description:
Gus's Community Market is honored to welcome our friends at Brouwerij West for a tap takeover. We will be pouring at least 3 different beers from them as well as offering multiple fresh cans for sale.

Brouwerij West Beers on tap will be:

-Tahiti Substation: New England IPA brewed with 40% raw spelt, Mecca Grade Barley, Citra and Azacca Hops.

-8 1/2: New England IPA brewed with Mecca Grade barley, raw spelt, raw barley, & oats hopped with simcoe

-Starfish: New England IPA brewed with Mecca Grade barley, raw spelt, raw oats, and raw rye. Double dry-hopped with Chinook and Centennial hops.

And bottles available:

-Chinatown: Mixed fermentation with malted barley, raw buckwheat - aged in used syrah puncheons

-Animal Farm: Mixed fermentation with malted barley, raw buckwheat - aged on fresh peaches

posts.title: Double Down with Fall Brewing and Fieldwork
posts.description:
Come and taste through a bunch of exclusives from Fall Brewing and Fieldwork! Fall Brewing is another great non-distro brewery from San Diego, where Fieldwork has close ties! Cheers to old friends!

Check out our website or Untappd for a full draft list prior to the event!

posts.title: Thirstier Thursday ft. a Sour Beer Release Party
posts.description: We've been having a love affair with sour beers for sometime now and we're ready to share some of our most prized creations. Come see what we've been up to and maybe even catch a surprise show at the brewery tonight.

posts.title: Wild Brews
posts.description:
Join us for pizza and sour beers from local breweries and beyond. 6 to 8 sour handles to quench your thirst. A tasting of your choice of any 4 or by the single serve. local & imported cheese to pair well with sour beer.

4-9:30 pm. No reservations.

posts.title: Meet the Brewer - Drake's Brewing Co.
posts.description:
Join us as Drake's Brewing Company, the San Leandro-based brewery, pays us a visit and pours a selection of Drake's finest beers.

Throughout SFBW, there will be a rotating selection of brews on tap and by-the-bottle, and beer-friendly food.

posts.title: CaliCrafts and Blind Cats
posts.description: CaliCraft Brewery shows off their fantastic standard brews and brings along some crazy creative special barrels for a day in the Mission.

posts.title: Big Beer Night
posts.description:
We like big beers and we cannot lie! To celebrate the titans of the beer world we will be featuring a variety of fresh and cellar aged malty masterpieces. The list will include:
2012 Lost Abbey Serpent’s Stout
2013 Prairie Christmas BOMB!
2013 Avery Mephistopheles
2013 Alesmith Speedway Stout
2014 Port Older Viscosity
2014 Deschutes The Abyss
…and more!

posts.title: Evening with Russian River Brewing
posts.description: Limited and special releases from Russian River Brewing.

posts.title: SoMa Biergarten Festival
posts.description:
You are invited to celebrate SF Beer Week in the beautiful outdoors of SOMA San Francisco at Outcamp by Campsyte on Thursday night!

Complete with sausage grill, homemade pretzels, a line up of SF Beer Week German-style, special releases and IPA's from Black Hammer Brewing for sale. Cornhole, beer, popular German drinking songs, hammocks, tree tents, vintage trailer cabins... a perfect mid-SF beer week oasis!

posts.title: Hops Vegas
posts.description: Hops Vegas takes you on a tour of hoppiness, wth fun and games for all.  Come taste saisons, red ales, pilsners, ciders and more. Not just for IPA anymore.

posts.title: Winner Winner Chicken Dinner! HenHouse's DIPA Big Chicken
posts.description:
This massively aromatic Double IPA uses 11 lbs per barrel of hops! There simply isn’t another way for you to get beer this aromatic, this huge and this fresh into your mouth ever.

We will be comprising a winning chicken dish to compliment this remarkable beer. As with all nights, reservations through Open Table are strongly recommended as this is a Friday night of SFBW and our restaurant is small and gets filled quickly with not only beer folk, but diners from near and far.

posts.title: Yappy Hour with Oakland Animal Services
posts.description: It's no secret that we love pups! We're joining forces with Oakland Animal Services to help some four-legged friends find homes. Join us for a super special Yappy Hour from 4-8pm with adoptable shelter dogs at the tasting room from 4:30 - 6:30pm. Dogs are, of course, welcome, and we’ll have special treats and a pup photo booth so you can snap some selfies with your fur baby. Don’t worry humans, we have treats for you, too--get one of our featured brews plus a tasty taco for $5! A portion of pint sales for the night will go to Friends of Oakland Animal Services, so you’re helping just by ordering a beer. Cheers, pups!

posts.title: Monkey Paw & Marin Brewing - Bar Crawl + Meet the Brewers
posts.description:
Four local Bernal bars have teamed up with San Diego Brewery, Monkey Paw, and Marin Brewing to bring you some special. Scot & Arne will be cruising around drinking their beers at:
- Rock Bar
- St. Mary's Pub
- Old Devil Moon
- Holy Water
Come join us as we cruise through Bernal drinking beer!

posts.title: Imperial Stout Release
posts.description: It's Emmmmmmperial.

posts.title: Central Coast Showcase & Benefit
posts.description:
A lot has been going on in the Central Coast outside of brewing some phenomenal beers. Much of our state has been victim to devastating fire and flood, most recently Santa Barbara and Ventura Counties. However, we find ways to persist, support each other, and continue to produce awesome beer! Join us to get a taste of the Central Coast and raise money to help our California neighbors.

In addition to a variety of our beer that will be on tap, we will be showcasing 10 beers from some of our friends in the Central Coast. $2 from every guest beer sold will be donated to the Thomas Fire and Flood Fund in order to help those that were affected. Check our what breweries we will be showcasing for this event below.

Barrelworks | Buellton, CA
Brewery Rex | Santa Barbara, CA
Casa Agria Specialty Ales | Oxnard, CA
Central Coast Brewing Co. | San Luis Obispo, CA
Figueroa Mountain Brewing Co. | Buellton, CA
Firestone Brewing Company | Paso Robles, CA
Topa Topa Brewing Co. | Ventura, CA

Come for beers and stay for dinner. The Tasting Room & Kitchen will be in full swing and dishin’ up some awesome food to enjoy with these tasty brews.

posts.title: Self-Distribution Alliance/Locals Only Tap Takeover
posts.description: East Bay Representing! Come on up the hill and join Alameda Island, Ale Industries, Altamont, Gilman, and Oakland United as we crush through 25 beers!

posts.title: CaliCraft Tap Takeover
posts.description: Our first Calicraft event, and we're going big -- with the ABV, that is! The Walnut Creek brewery will be taking over five of our taps and happily pouring Karl the Foggier IIPA, The Bay IIPA, Double Oaktown, Sour Hibiscus and a Hazy IPA TBD.

posts.title: Neighborhood Collaboration Night
posts.description: On this night, we'll have all five collaboration brews from the various San Francisco neighborhoods, as well as the all inclusive SF Brewers Guild collaboration.  Come taste all six in one place on this special night.

posts.title: Fort Point + Proxy Present Blade Runner 2049
posts.description:
Join Fort Point Beer Company at the PROXY Walk-In Theater for a special SF Beer Week screening of "Blade Runner 2049."

Thirty years after the events of the first film, a new blade runner, LAPD Officer K (Ryan Gosling), unearths a long-buried secret that has the potential to plunge what's left of society into chaos. K's discovery leads him on a quest to find Rick Deckard (Harrison Ford), a former LAPD blade runner who has been missing for 30 years.

Fort Point Beer Company will be on hand serving a selection of our favorite beers, and Del Popolo will fire up pizza to order. Free admission, proceeds from beer sales benefit Here for Now, an organization that brings people together around ideas and issues - activating public space, transcending barriers, and opening minds.

posts.title: Beer & Cheese Pairing
posts.description:
Sample 4 unique beers paired perfectly with 4 varieties of cheese tasting led by our very own cheese monger

beers & cheeses TBA

posts.title: Fort Point Tap Takeover
posts.description: Fort Point Beer Company will do a tap takeover at Gott's Roadside, and one of their beers will be featured in beer-battered Fish & Chips special for the day.

posts.title: 'Acid Tripping' with New Belgium
posts.description:
We're going full sour ahead with New Belgium! Order a flight of four sours ranging from mildly sour to in-your-face sour, then eat a magic fruit candy that inhibits acidity and taste all four again! We'll be pouring:

Sour Saison
Le Terroir
La Folie
Transatlantique Kriek

Afterwards try a lemon wedge for kicks!

posts.title: Woods Islay IPA Release
posts.description: What's better than a fresh-brewed, sticky strong, citrus-and-pine-packed double IPA? A fresh-brewed, sticky strong, citrus-and-pine-packed double IPA -- infused with peat from Laphroaig barrel aging! Beer hounds and whisky snobs, unite!

posts.title: Mission Trail Takeover
posts.description:
We're breaking away from beer for a day to feature our favorite producer of fermented fruit, Mission Trail. Their tart, effervescent, plum-based fermented beverages will appeal to both sour beer fans and cider drinkers. We'll be tapping some barrel aged rarities along with a few fresh kegs of their jerkum and perry.

Tap list:

Bayas de Califas - 18.5% ABV
Bourbon and French oak barrel aged pyment mead brewed with mission grapes, blackberries, raspberries & black currants

California Currency - 7% ABV
100% 2016 California pluot aged over 1 year in French oak barrels

Caribbean Cold Front - 6.7% ABV
White plum jerkum with guava, soursop & cranberries

Eddie Rickenbacher's Last Call - 14% ABV
Pomegranate wine aged in bourbon barrels for 8 months

Fairyland - 14.6% ABV
Blend of co-fermented Dapple Dandy and Dapple Fire pluots aged in a Bastardo Port barrel

Plum Jungle - 7.8% ABV
White plum jerkum aged in French oak barrels with tart cherries, apricots and pineapple

Shinko Perry - 6% ABV
Perry made from 100% Asian shinko pears

Wunpost Plum - 11% ABV
Japanese plums fermented with sake yeast & aged in pinot noir barrels for 16 months

posts.title: Hand-Cranked Cask Ale Night with Berryessa
posts.description: Berryessa Brewing will be bringing in 4 Cask Ales for us, all special releases a super unique.  So if you love a traditional cask ale you definitely will want to come join us for this event!!  We for sure will have the latest version of the Big Brown Beaver, an english IPA, and a sour.  The fourth is so exciting we can't even put it in writing.

posts.title: Pizza Port Night
posts.description:
Pizza Port Brewing Company takes over the restaurant as part of our San Francisco Beer Week festivities! Free Pizza Port Brewing Company glassware while supplies last!

We'll be pouring:

Blinky Triple Eye PA

Gnarbucks Coffee Porter

posts.description:
Featuring 15 Northern California brewerie: NorCal
Calicraft

Tap it Brewing
Track 7
Mraz Brewing

ej phair
